education.extras: 4-year Men's Water Polo Athlete, 2022 Team Captain, 2021 DIII National Champion, 3x SCIAC Regular Season Champion, 2x SCIAC Tournament Champion, 3x First-Team All SCIAC, 2022 Offensive Player of the Year
Treasurer of the Computer Science Graduate Student Association, Vanderbilt Men's Club Water Polo

about: I have just under a year of working experience as a software engineer at Elementary Robotics where I spent time on the Edge Team. My contributions were centered around advancing the simulated environment within which product testing took place; as well as DevOps-adjacent tasks such as developing scripts that enabled easier and more effective testing sequences and engineering CI/CD pipelines with greater coverage. In essence, I helped allow a more reliable development and delivery of the product to the customer.
